hiveArticle.title: Home Made Cake
hiveArticle.body:
One of the problem vegetarian people like us face is that we do not get EggLess Cake so easily in the market. And so that it's better to make it at home itself rather than running around shops to find out the eggless cake. We too have made the cake at home using Pressure Cooker and Gas i.e. not even at the oven. 

It's a chocolate cake and the toppings is of Stone chocolate. 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/1ukkm0pun6.jpg)

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/nbknjqov38.jpg)
